allow: Bash("C:\\Users\\ganes\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python312\\python.exe" -c "import sqlite3; conn = sqlite3.connect\(''data/compliance.db''\); cursor = conn.cursor\(\); cursor.execute\(''SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type=""table""''\); print\(''Tables:'', [row[0] for row in cursor.fetchall\(\)]\); conn.close\(\)")

Bash("C:\\Users\\ganes\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python312\\python.exe" -c "import sqlite3, json; conn = sqlite3.connect\(''data/compliance.db''\); cursor = conn.cursor\(\); cursor.execute\(''SELECT mccs, regions, transaction_types FROM compliance_items LIMIT 1''\); row = cursor.fetchone\(\); print\(''MCCs:'', repr\(row[0]\)\); print\(''Regions:'', repr\(row[1]\)\); print\(''Transaction Types:'', repr\(row[2]\)\); conn.close\(\)")

Bash("C:\\Users\\ganes\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python312\\python.exe" -c "import sqlite3; conn = sqlite3.connect\(''data/compliance.db''\); cursor = conn.cursor\(\); cursor.execute\(''SELECT id, source_id, scraped_at, status, LENGTH\(content\) as content_length FROM snapshots ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5''\); print\(''Recent Snapshots:''\); for row in cursor.fetchall\(\): print\(f''ID: {row[0]} | Source: {row[1]} | Time: {row[2]} | Status: {row[3]} | Size: {row[4]} chars''\); conn.close\(\)")

Bash("C:\\Users\\ganes\\AppData\\Local\\Programs\\Python\\Python312\\python.exe" -c "import sqlite3; conn = sqlite3.connect\(''data/compliance.db''\); cursor = conn.cursor\(\); cursor.execute\(''DELETE FROM compliance_items''\); cursor.execute\(''DELETE FROM changes WHERE id <= 7''\); conn.commit\(\); print\(''Deleted demo data''\); cursor.execute\(''SELECT COUNT\(*\) FROM compliance_items''\); print\(f''Remaining compliance items: {cursor.fetchone\(\)[0]}''\); conn.close\(\)")
